title: 3 Simple Ways to Download the TikTok Mobile App

steps.title: Open the Google Play Store .
steps.content: Open the Google Play Store . You'll find this app on one of your Home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Type TikTok into the search bar.
steps.content: Type TikTok into the search bar. You'll find the search bar at the top of the screen. App suggestions will appear below your search.

steps.title: Press on your keyboard.
steps.content: Press on your keyboard. If you're using a keyboard other than the built-in Gboard, you might have a different "Enter" key.

steps.title: Tap TikTok.
steps.content: Tap TikTok . This should be the first result in the list that's offered by TikTok Pte. Ltd.

steps.title: Tap Install.
steps.content: Tap Install . You'll see this button under the app's title and app icon, which looks like a stylized music note. The app will install and you'll find it on one of your home screens and/or in the app drawer.

steps.title: Tap Open.
steps.content: Tap Open . This will launch the app from the Play Store. You can also find the app icon on your home screen or app drawer. You can now create an account to make TikTok videos and view others.

steps.title: Open the App Store .
steps.content: Open the App Store . This looks like a white A with a blue background. TikTok requires iOS 11 or later, so be sure to update your iOS . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Search.
steps.content: Tap Search . This will be in the bottom-right corner, below a magnifying glass.

steps.title: Tap the search bar and enter TikTok.
steps.content: Tap the search bar and enter TikTok . Results will load as you type.

steps.title: Tap search.
steps.content: Tap search . This is the blue button on your keyboard.

steps.title: Tap TikTok.
steps.content: Tap TikTok . This should be the first app on the results page. Make sure it's the app by TikTok Ltd.

steps.title: Tap Get.
steps.content: Tap Get . You'll see this blue button next to the app's title and icon, which looks like a stylized music note. Depending on your settings, you may need to use Touch ID, Face ID, or a PIN to complete the download. Once the installation is finished, you'll then the app on one of your home screens.

steps.title: Tap Open.
steps.content: Tap Open . This will open TikTok from the app store. You can also find the app on your home screen or App Library. Create a new account to begin using TikTok. You can also recover an existing account . Once you're logged in, you can create your first video . Continue to createâ€”you may be on your way to becoming TikTok famous .

steps.title: Open the Microsoft Store app.
steps.content: Open the Microsoft Store app. Type "Microsoft Store" into the Start menu and click the first result. By default, you'll see the Home page.

steps.title: Type TikTok into the search bar.
steps.content: Type TikTok into the search bar. You can find this at the top of the window. Press Enter or click the magnifying glass to submit your search.

steps.title: Click TikTok.
steps.content: Click TikTok . This will be the first result. The icon looks like a multi-colored music note with a black background. Make sure it's the app by TikTok Pte. Ltd. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Click Get.
steps.content: Click Get . This is the blue button to the right of the app name. Your download will begin. It may take a few moments depending on your internet connection.

steps.title: Click Open.
steps.content: Click Open . When your download is finished, the Get button will turn into Open . The TikTok app will open. Upon first launch, you can choose to create a desktop shortcut and/or pin it to your taskbar. Otherwise, you can find TikTok in the Start menu. Click Log in to enter your TikTok account information, or click Sign up to create a new account. When you sign up for TikTok, it will ask about your interests and provide videos on your for you page. Once you begin scrolling on the for you page and interacting with content , it will give you more posts similar to the ones you like or comment on. You can customize your for you page with the help of the TikTok algorithm . If you like a couple of TikToks about Harry Potter, you will see much more Harry Potter content pop up for you. You can also search for something you are interested in and like the content from that search to tell the algorithm what you like to see more.
